Transparency.justification: Score = 1 because 2 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Ticketmaster Embraces Transparency in Pricing Under New FTC Rule
relevantSources.summary: Ticketmaster commits to transparent pricing, revealing all fees upfront as mandated by FTC.
relevantSources.evaluation: This source provides concrete evidence of transparent pricing practices and clear communication of costs.

relevantSources.title: Live Nation's All-In Pricing Policy Delivers Increased Ticketing Transparency
relevantSources.summary: Live Nation's pricing transparency policy shows total costs upfront, boosting sales by 8%.
relevantSources.evaluation: This source demonstrates detailed, verifiable transparency initiatives in business practices.

Transparency.findings: Live Nation and Ticketmaster have implemented policies requiring all ticketing fees and total costs to be disclosed upfront, in compliance with regulatory requirements. These sources provide concrete evidence of transparent pricing practices and efforts to build consumer trust through clear communication of costs.

Privacy & Security.justification: Score = 1 because 3 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Live Nation Entertainment Privacy Policy
relevantSources.summary: Comprehensive privacy policy detailing data collection, use, and protection measures for users.
relevantSources.evaluation: This privacy policy provides concrete evidence of data protection and user privacy measures.

relevantSources.title: Privacy Policy - Ticketmaster
relevantSources.summary: Ticketmaster's privacy framework explaining data handling and user control mechanisms.
relevantSources.evaluation: This policy demonstrates detailed privacy governance and user data control frameworks.

relevantSources.title: Live Nation confirms jumbo breach, Ticketmaster customer data
relevantSources.summary: Live Nation's response to 2024 data breach affecting Ticketmaster customer information.
relevantSources.evaluation: This source provides concrete evidence of incident response and security measures following a data breach.

Privacy & Security.findings: Live Nation and Ticketmaster maintain detailed privacy policies outlining data collection, user rights, and security safeguards. The company has demonstrated incident response procedures following a major data breach, including notifying users and offering credit monitoring, reflecting concrete privacy and security practices.

relevantSources.title: Live Nation Entertainment hiring Sr. IT Internal Auditor

Governance & Accountability.findings: Live Nation has a formal corporate governance structure, including a board, audit committee, and compliance teams. The company actively recruits for internal audit roles, reflecting established risk management and accountability processes.

relevantSources.evaluation: This source demonstrates formal external audit and regulatory compliance processes.

Public Commitments & External Audits.findings: Live Nation and Ticketmaster have been subject to external regulatory actions and fines, resulting in mandated compliance and ethics programs. The company publishes annual reports and SEC filings, providing evidence of ongoing external audits and regulatory oversight.

summary.overallFindings: Live Nation Entertainment demonstrates strong practices in transparency, privacy and security, governance, and external accountability, with concrete evidence of transparent pricing, robust privacy policies, formal governance structures, and regulatory compliance. However, there is no public evidence addressing fairness and bias mitigation, explainability, or human oversight in AI systems. The company’s responsible AI maturity is solid in operational and compliance areas but lacks documentation or commitments in key ethical and technical AI domains.
